Arsenal face an anxious wait on further news over the extent of Vivianne Miedema's injury after she was stretchered of f during Thursday's 1-0 defeat by Lyon.

articles.title: How West Brom became a club in decline - The Telegraph
articles.description: Fans are increasingly worried and angry about the malaise at the Hawthorns, with Guochuan Lai, the majority shareholder, nowhere to be seen
articles.content:
West Bromwich Albion are finally moving up the Championship table, but they remain a club in a state of paralysis and desperately needing new ownership.
